name: MECYSTEINE HYDROCHLORIDE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From 3.7 Mucolytics: British National Formulary)
Mucolytics should be used with caution in those with a history of peptic ulceration because they may disrupt the gastric mucosal barrier.
doses:
200 mg 4 times daily for 2 days, then 200 mg 3 times daily
for 6 weeks, then 200 mg twice daily; child 5–12 years 100 mg 3 times daily
